original_title: SC dismisses FR petition seeking to invalidate Rohitha Abeygunawardena’s MP seat
original_body_lines: The Supreme Court today (30) dismissed a Fundamental Rights petition filed by former Minister Rajitha Senaratne, which sought a ruling to invalidate the election of former Minister Rohitha Abeygunawardena as a Member of Parliament for the Kalutara District at the last General Election.
The Supreme Court issued the order after considering the submissions presented by both parties, said Ada Derana reporter.
